{"id":506454252,"lang":"python3","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1623430291,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"52 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/506454252/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"14.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxPower(self, s: str) -> int:\n        grp = []\n        i = 1\n        ct = 0\n        if len(s) == 0 or len(s) == 1: return 1\n        while i<len(s):\n            while i<len(s) and s[i] == s[i-1]:\n                ct += 1\n                i += 1\n            grp.append(ct+1)\n            ct = 0\n            i += 1\n        return max(grp)\n            \n                \n            \n            \n        \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
